topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Applying the NIC Bonding Patch

section.p: For bonded NIC environments, use the following steps to install a required patch.

ol.li: Copy the patch file to /root/ directory on the HLM host.
Execute the following command to download the patch package: apt-get install patch
Change to the root/kenobi-configuration-processor directory: cd /root/kenobi-configuration-processor
Execute the following command to launch the patch installation: patch -p1 ../cg-hos-nic-bonding.patch
Execute following command to synch the patch file: /root/cg-hlm/hlm-build/hlm_prepare-env.sh
And then run all steps starting from running hcfgproc again
